response.original_title: The Atlantics: Flight of the Surf Dogs
response.overview: Australian band the Atlantics supply the surf tunes that accompany renowned cinematographer Ray Hollowell's spectacular footage of some of the world's top surfers performing amazing feats on Hawaii's waves. Kea and Pal, the famous surfing dogs of Waikiki, join in the action as well, along with some beautiful beach babes. Concert footage and interviews with surfer Jamie O'Brien and the Waikiki Beach Boys are included.
response.title: The Atlantics: Flight of the Surf Dogs
